feed.title: Ark Server Manager Version Feed
feed.subtitle: This is the Ark Server Manager beta version feed.

ul.li: Server Settings (Dinos section) - fixed the bForceCanRideFliers (Enable Flyer Riding (Genesis)) setting, so it clears the value in the gameusersettings.ini file if unchecked.
Server Settings (Stack Sizes) - new section that allows you to manange your individual item stack sizes. Has an option in the global setting to turn on/off.
